I'm not gay, and if you call me stupid, or an idiot,
why should I not talk about my IQ, if you didn't say I
was stupid I wouldn't.

--- Legendarynemasis@... wrote:
> I think by now everyone is pretty much bored to
> death and sick of eharing 
> about your supposed IQ of 150. Quite frankly I
> wouldn't care if it was 250, 
> 50, a 40, 88mm, or just plain 1. The fact of the
> matter is, intelligence is 
> not something to gloat about which is something I
> bet you do in school alot 
> and is the reason why you get made of fun so much. 
> 
> ~LN
> 
> P.S. If you learned what I did from watching
> bedazzled, you'd know that 
> overly intelligent people ARE gay. Let's see how
> often you brag about your 
> intelligence now.
> 
> In a message dated 9/17/02 7:44:32 AM Eastern
> Daylight Time, 
> dewboy30816@... writes:
> 
> 
> > And I have an IQ of 150. 
> > Please don't shove it down my throat if yours is
> > higher, I'm just telling you I'm not an idiot. 
> And
> > while I sometimes sound rude I said that simply
> > pointing out "long live" is the general
> expression. 
> > Actually "long life" may be nice for a change, but
> > "long live so-and-so is all I've ever heard said. 
> I'm
> > not taking a shot at airly, if I made a mistake
> like
> > that in Spanish I'd want him to tell me.
> > 
> 
> 
>
